name: Everything's fine
description:
Have you ever felt like everything was crashing down on you? Everything needs to be absolutely perfect, and if not--well, that means you're just a complete failure.

Everything's fine explores the struggle of having anxiety, specifically in the form of atychiphobia, the fear of failure, through the experience of a college student named Chi.  You as the player will live through Chi's struggles in a 2D sidescroll gameplay. Why not give it a try?

Warning:  Please be advised there may be triggering aspects of the game, such as screen shakes, bombs and bomb noises. Please play with care. 

Music: 

Main Menu: Threnody by Soularfair (CC BY-NC-ND 4.0)

Main Theme: Battle Theme by Komiku

Credits Music: Into the Light by The Owl (CC BY-NC-ND 4.0)

Mac Users: In order to open up the game, please hold down CONTROL, then click on the application.
